#summary Editor - Race window - Days tab

= Introduction =

Days tab of Race window contains the list of the available [Terminology#Day days]. And you can create new [Terminology#Day days]. You can also edit some properties of the [Terminology#Race race]:

 * long name
 * short description (that will be displayed in the main menu if the user click on the race in the list)
 * image: path to the race picture. (that will be displayed in the main menu if the user click on the race in the list)
